lore: The game world is crafted to provide a rich and evolving experience for players.
Players assume different roles, each with unique abilities and goals, shaping the course of their adventure.
Every decision matters, influencing outcomes and unlocking new paths.
gameplay: Players can choose their preferred playstyle, focusing on strategy, action, or exploration.
Core mechanics include solving challenges, managing resources, and interacting with dynamic environments.
The game offers progression systems, unlockable content, and opportunities to customize and upgrade.
messageExamples: Start a new quest in the Forgotten Forest.
What items do I have in my inventory?
Attack the goblin with my sword.
Solve the riddle to unlock the hidden door.
questExamples: Explore the Forgotten Forest and find the ancient artifact.
Defeat the Dark Sorcerer and save the village.
Gather rare herbs for the healer in the mountains.
Unravel the mystery of the lost kingdom.
